title: Episode 8: Taxing Robots Does Not Compute
itunes:title: Episode 8: Taxing Robots Does Not Compute
description: This week, Antony and James break down Bill Gates' recent suggestion that companies that use robots instead of human workers should pay employment taxes in order to fund new welfare programs.
content:encoded: This week, Antony and James break down Bill Gates' recent suggestion that companies that use robots instead of human workers should pay employment taxes in order to fund new welfare programs.
itunes:subtitle: This week, Antony and James break down Bill Gates' recent suggestion that companies that use robots instead of human workers should pay employment taxes in order to fund new welfare programs.
itunes:author: Foundation for Economic Education
